summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting an easement for water line purposes over portions of Lot 4, Block 2, Assessor's Plat of Endolyne, and of Government Lot 1, Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M., and of Blocks 492 and 493, Seattle Tide Lands Extension No. 1 together with 2nd class tide lands adjoining, in lieu of a prior easement for such purpose and releasing such prior easement for such purpose and releasing such prior easement.
